file_content.text: This looks like the goods, all right.
Step back, Houk. He's still ours until the credits change hands.
Rogun already said what he'll pay. It's not subject to negotiation.
Everything is subject to negotiation.
I beg to differ.
You're going home empty-handed, Strilth.
Walk away while you still can.
I still owe Rogun for Hoth.
You're a dead man.
Come on, that didn't turn out so bad, right? I'll shut up now.
Haha. I've heard of you, Captain. I never thought to meet such a notorious thorn in the great Rogun's side.
She tried to play Rogun for a fool. Kill her and I'll double the price on this one.
He stole from Rogun. If you let him live, our deal is off.
This is a private business arrangement, Captain. I'll have to ask you to leave. Unless you were planning to make an offer...?
How long do you want to gamble that Rogun's empire stays bigger than mine?
You should deal with me.
An interesting question. We've noticed your rise, Captain.
Your alliance with Rogun's former White Maw pirates gives you a lot of influence in the Outer Rim.
Your access to those Nebula prototypes has brought a lot of buyers flowing into Port Nowhere.
Though it seems you have mostly chosen to throw your lot in with the Republic.
Rogun will kill you if you make a deal with this scum!
Are you threatening me? Do you truly think Rogun would war against the entire Hutt Cartel on your word?
Hand over Combo unless you want this place to smell like fried Hutt.
How about I let you live?
Slow down, Captain. Business deals are best accomplished at leisure. You are far too hasty.
You both die.
No deals.
Should I kill her for you?
Should I kill him for you?
You kill everyone here, Captain, who's to say who did it? Strilth's not known for working things out peacefully.
Vaz! I--I knew you'd save me, Vaz buddy. I--I just knew it.
Frame Rogun for killing Raskurro, you cut off his ties to the entire Hutt Cartel.
If he can't deal with the Hutts, Rogun's going to lose half his suppliers.
I wouldn't risk it, Captain. Hutts make bad enemies. Not such good friends, either, come to think of it....
Too many ways for that to backfire.
Smart plan. I like this robber.
Rogun's already butted up against cartel controls. It wouldn't take much to convince them he'd attacked.
You wouldn't dare!
You heard the other option. Who do you want to be working with in the long run?
We can work something out.
The Hutt Cartel has always appreciated boldness. We are amenable to your offer, Captain.
No! I won't let this scum humiliate Rogun a second time!
You have my permission to silence him.
You hear that, Raskurro? Hand over Combo, or that's my other option.
You want to die, Hutt?
This isn't how we do business, Captain. It's not wise of you to set yourself against the Hutts.
But I certainly value my life more than this poor fool. Take him and go!
No! You won't steal from Rogun a second time!
Finish this how you like. I'm done here.
Good idea. [Kill Raskurro]
No! No, don't hurt me!
